document_data.name: Elliach
document_data.mainbody: '''Elliach''' was an insane [[mage]] inside the [[Wandering Emporium]], which traveled across the plains of [[Avernus]] in the [[Nine Hells]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Elliach was on the run from debt collectors when he met [[Mahadi]]. Fascinated by him, he paid the collectors and invited Elliach to remain inside the Emporium.
document_data.Activities: Elliach collected and sold [[demon ichor]], which he used in various experiments.
document_data.Personality: Most people believed Elliach to be insane.
document_data.Powers: The demon ichor had warped Elliach in two aspects: his arms had become two tentacles with fingers at the end, and his ears grew wings and flew away, so Elliach was [[deaf]].
